statements: SELECT * FROM targeted_locations;
SELECT location_name, campaign_budget FROM targeted_locations WHERE target_audience = 'Young Adults';
SELECT location_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM targeted_locations WHERE campaign_budget > 1000;
SELECT * FROM targeted_locations ORDER BY campaign_budget DESC;
SELECT location_name, target_audience FROM targeted_locations WHERE campaign_start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT location_name, campaign_budget FROM targeted_locations WHERE target_audience = 'Families' ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM targeted_locations WHERE campaign_budget > 5000 AND campaign_end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, target_audience, campaign_budget FROM targeted_locations WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY campaign_budget DESC;
SELECT AVG(campaign_budget) AS average_budget, MIN(campaign_budget) AS min_budget, MAX(campaign_budget) AS max_budget FROM targeted_locations WHERE target_audience = 'Students';

SELECT location_name, target_audience, DATEDIFF(campaign_end_date, campaign_start_date) AS campaign_duration_days FROM targeted_locations WHERE campaign_budget BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY campaign_duration_days DESC;
SELECT * FROM targeted_locations;
SELECT location_name, city FROM targeted_locations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM targeted_locations ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT stunt_id, stunt_name, stunt_date FROM marketing_stunts ORDER BY stunt_date DESC;
SELECT stunt_name, location_name, city, country FROM marketing_stunts JOIN targeted_locations ON marketing_stunts.location_id=targeted_locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM targeted_locations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT location_name, city FROM targeted_locations WHERE city='New York';
SELECT * FROM marketing_stunts WHERE stunt_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM targeted_locations WHERE city='Los Angeles' AND country='USA';
SELECT stunt_name, stunt_date, stunt_description FROM marketing_stunts ORDER BY stunt_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM targeted_locations;
SELECT location_name, target_audience FROM targeted_locations WHERE target_audience = 'Families';
SELECT location_id, location_name, budget FROM targeted_locations ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT stunt_name, stunt_date FROM marketing_stunts WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM stunt_participants WHERE participant_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM targeted_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC, location_id ASC;
SELECT location_name, target_audience, budget FROM targeted_locations WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT s.stunt_name, p.participant_name, p.participant_email FROM marketing_stunts s JOIN stunt_participants p ON s.stunt_id = p.stunt_id;
SELECT s.stunt_name, s.stunt_date, l.location_name FROM marketing_stunts s JOIN targeted_locations l ON s.location_id = l.location_id WHERE s.stunt_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT l.location_name, COUNT(*) AS total_stunts FROM marketing_stunts s JOIN targeted_locations l ON s.location_id = l.location_id GROUP BY l.location_name ORDER BY total_stunts DESC;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_locations;
SELECT location_name, stunt_description FROM guerrilla_marketing_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_teams WHERE team_size > 5;
SELECT stunt_name, stunt_date FROM marketing_stunts WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM stunt_feedback WHERE feedback_rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_teams ORDER BY team_size DESC, team_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, stunt_description FROM guerrilla_marketing_locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM marketing_teams WHERE team_size >= 5 AND team_size <= 10;

SELECT ms.stunt_name, ml.location_name, mt.team_name FROM marketing_stunts ms JOIN guerrilla_marketing_locations ml ON ms.location_id = ml.location_id JOIN marketing_teams mt ON ms.team_id = mt.team_id;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM stunt_feedback ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM TargetedLocations;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM TargetedLocations WHERE city='New York';
SELECT stunt_name, description, cost FROM MarketingStunts ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM MarketingTeam WHERE location_id=1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM TargetedLocations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM TargetedLocations WHERE city='New York';
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM MarketingTeam JOIN TargetedLocations ON MarketingTeam.location_id = TargetedLocations.location_id WHERE city='Los Angeles';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns JOIN TargetedLocations ON MarketingCampaigns.location_id = TargetedLocations.location_id WHERE country='Canada';

SELECT CampaignResults.result_id, CampaignResults.feedback, MarketingCampaigns.campaign_name FROM CampaignResults JOIN MarketingCampaigns ON CampaignResults.campaign_id = MarketingCampaigns.campaign_id WHERE success_rate > 80;
